# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Library                                                | Version | Supported          |
|--------------------------------------------------------|---------|--------------------|
| [Rust](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust)              | 1.77.2  | :heavy_check_mark: |
| [Shuttle](https://github.com/shuttle-hq/shuttle)       | 0.46.0  | :heavy_check_mark: |
